item.title: 2016-PyConAU 2016 Presentation
item.description: I presented a talk on Big data biology for pythonistas: getting in on the genomics revolution at PyCon Au 2016. Video See the full video on youtube here. Slides Big data biology for pythonistas: getting in on the genomics revolution from Darya Vanichkina Abstract In 2001 Bill Clinton unveiled “the most important, most wondrous map ever produced by humankind” - the human genome. This monumental endeavour cost $3 billion, and took hundreds of scientists from all over the world 13 years.
